term.title: spontaneous fission

item.text: Nuclear fission which occurs without the addition of particles or energy to the nucleus

sources.item: PAC, 1982, 54, 1533. 'Glossary of terms used in nuclear analytical chemistry (Provisional)' on page 1542 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac198254081533)
